local_intent: Perceive the white plate, perform approach-and-align, execute pick using the precomputed grasp, and verify the object is in the gripper.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose has previously written 'white_plate_grasp' to the blackboard
Gripper is open and functional before pick
Workspace permits approach from current pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the active micro-goal (ApproachAndAlign) from the global plan: re-detects the white plate (with retries), aligns with specified tolerance and timeout, performs the Pick using the precomputed grasp key, and verifies ObjectInGripper. Port values match the NODE_LIBRARY enumerations where applicable.
